name: fishing: into the abyss
description:
“Beware that, when fishing for squids, you yourself do not become a squid… for when you fish long into the abyss. The abyss fishes also into you.”

This is a space, steampunk, fishing, bullet hell, card game. I didn’t like the theme, so I took it to the extreme!

There is a boss battle at the end, so be sure to try and win.

**F for fullscreen**
